title: Create a task
name: CreateTask
description: Create a task corresponding to the given TaskSetting. The task will be automatically run.

permission.name: user
permission.title: User access only
permission.description: All users can access this API

Success 200.description: Task status code, defined as [SCHEDULED = 0, RUNNING = 1, SUCCEEDED = 2, FAILED = 3, DELETING = 4, PENDING = 5, TLE = 6, WAITING = 7]
Name of the user that the task belongs to

permission.name: user

title: Get task list
name: GetTaskSettingsList
description: For user, the API returns tasks belong to him. For admin, the API returns all tasks.

permission.name: user
permission.title: User access only
permission.description: All users can access this API

Parameter.description: Specifies the page number (starting from 1, per page 25 elements)

Success 200.description: Task status code, defined as [SCHEDULED = 0, RUNNING = 1, SUCCEEDED = 2, FAILED = 3, DELETING = 4, PENDING = 5, TLE = 6, WAITING = 7, MLE = 8]
Name of the user that the task belongs to

permission.name: admin
permission.title: Admin access only
permission.description: Only admin user can access this API

examples.title: Request-Example:
examples.content:
{
    "name": "task_name",
    "description": "This is a demo test.",
    "container_config": {
            "image": "nginx:latest",
            "persistent_volume": {
                    "name": "ceph-pvc",
                    "mount_path": "/var/image/"
            },
            "shell": "/bin/bash",
            "commands": ["echo hello world", "echo $CLOUD_SCHEDULER_USER"],
            "memory_limit": "128M",
            "working_path": "/home/task/",
            "task_script_path": "scripts/",
            "task_initial_file_path": "initial/"
    },
    "time_limit": 900,
    "replica": 2,
    "ttl_interval": 5,
    "max_sharing_users": 1
}

Error 4xx.description: User does not have permission to access

title: Create file/directory in user space
description: Create a text file or directory in user space. Existing file will be overridden.
name: CreateItemUserSpace

permission.name: user
permission.title: User access only
permission.description: All users can access this API

permission.name: user
permission.title: User access only
permission.description: All users can access this API

title: Get file/directory in user space
description: Get the content of a file, or list a dir in user space. file and path parameter may not be used together. If the user enters user space for the first time, the content in initial folder of the task will be copied.
name: GetItemUserSpace

permission.name: user
permission.title: User access only
permission.description: All users can access this API

Success 200.description: Response payload. Can either be string of file content (when file is present) or list of file and path names (when path is present). The path name is followed by a trailing slash.

title: Get VNC pod
description: Get a VNC pod where user can edit files in user space in a GUI environment. Typically, the full VNC url can be wss://vnc_host:vnc_port/url_path. Only secure socket it supported to ensure security.
name: GetVNCPod

permission.name: user
permission.title: User access only
permission.description: All users can access this API

title: Reset user space
description: Reset user space, copy initial task files into it
name: ResetUserSpace

permission.name: user
permission.title: User access only
permission.description: All users can access this API

Parameter.description: Whether to clean all changes made by the user. If true, user changes will be dropped and then initial files get copied, otherwise initial files overwrite user changes only if necessary.

title: Update file/directory in user space
description: Rename file/directory, or change the content of the file. file operation may not be mixed with path operation. old_file and file together means move/rename the file, and the same applies to old_path and path. Adding a content param with file present will change the content of that file.
name: UpdateItemUserSpace
